snippet: Executives have long said America can't compete in building electronic devices. But the migration of carmaking from Japan is a case study in the most unlikely of transformations. Read more »
abstract: Executives have long said America can't compete in building electronic devices. But the migration of carmaking from Japan is a case study in the most unlikely of transformations. Read more »

headline.main: The iEconomy: In Pursuit of Nissan, a Jobs Lesson for the Tech Industry?
